name: VitaKelp® Hebridean Seaweed
description: VitaKelp™ is a highly nutritious edible seaweed that is wild harvested using proprietary processing, from the pristine sea lochs of the Scottish Outer Hebridean Islands. The nutritional profile of this brown seaweed, species Ascophyllum nodosum—commonly called Egg Wrack, Knotted Wrack or Rock Weed—cannot be matched in land plants and provides minerals at levels exceeding all other “superfoods. ”
